New Records: Jonatan Clase hit his first career home run
Kevin Gausman pitched six innings to match his career high in wins
Key Match Events: The game was crucial as it eliminated the Boston Red Sox from postseason contention
Jonatan Clase's home run in the seventh inning extended Toronto's lead
Post-Match Reflections: Boston manager Alex Cora expressed frustration about the team's missed opportunity
Jarren Duran had a 50th multi-hit game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Blue Jays avoided a three-game sweep
Vladimir Guerrero Jr. had 197 hits this season
Richard Fitts pitched 18 2/3 innings without allowing a run
